videos.alt_text: adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine
videos.title: adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine (2016)
videos.description: The 2016 Adidas commercial "Your Future is Not Mine," directed by Terence Neale, features influential creatives like Aleali May, Luka Sabbat, and Iman Shumpert, among others, who march confidently towards an optimistic future, challenging the preconceived notions of a dystopian tomorrow. This campaign, produced by the advertising agency Johannes Leonardo, emphasizes individual empowerment and the message that one's future is theirs to create, rallying viewers to defy negative expectations and shape their own destinies through creativity and personal initiative.
videos.director: Exile Edit, Nate Gross, Shane Reid
videos.additional_info:
adidas - Your Future Is Not Mine (2016)
The 2016 Adidas commercial "Your Future is Not Mine," directed by Terence Neale, features influential creatives like Aleali May, Luka Sabbat, and Iman Shumpert, among others, who march confidently towards an optimistic future, challenging the preconceived notions of a dystopian tomorrow. This campaign, produced by the advertising agency Johannes Leonardo, emphasizes individual empowerment and the message that one's future is theirs to create, rallying viewers to defy negative expectations and shape their own destinies through creativity and personal initiative.
Technique - Away from Camera , Ground Level , Product , Product: Shoes , Tracking
Director - Terence Neale
DOP - Sebastian Wintero

videos.title: The Dare - Perfume (2024)
videos.description: The "The Dare - Perfume 2024" commercial is an evocative and visually striking advertisement that captures the essence of boldness and sensuality. It features a series of elegantly choreographed scenes where the protagonist moves through various luxurious settings, exuding confidence and allure. The commercial employs a rich color palette and dramatic lighting to highlight the sophistication and intensity of the perfume. The narrative is punctuated by close-up shots of the perfume bottle, emphasizing its sleek design and the brand's logo, leaving a lasting impression of elegance and daring on the viewer.
videos.additional_info:
The Dare - Perfume (2024)
The "The Dare - Perfume 2024" commercial is an evocative and visually striking advertisement that captures the essence of boldness and sensuality. It features a series of elegantly choreographed scenes where the protagonist moves through various luxurious settings, exuding confidence and allure. The commercial employs a rich color palette and dramatic lighting to highlight the sophistication and intensity of the perfume. The narrative is punctuated by close-up shots of the perfume bottle, emphasizing its sleek design and the brand's logo, leaving a lasting impression of elegance and daring on the viewer.

Director - Nick Harwood

Editor - Josh Wehle
